title: Everyday Media Literacy: Scientific Information Search Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational digital literacy and experience in elementary science education
context.additional_context: A course where practicing elementary teachers focus on developing media information evaluation competencies for science classes, practicing through VR-recreated authentic educational scenarios

learning_goals: Evaluate science-related news/social media content according to a 4-step verification framework (source, evidence, intent, expert opinion).
Analyze current scientific issues such as climate change and AI by applying information-seeking strategies in a VR simulation environment.
Develop educational materials that restructure criteria for judging information reliability to align with elementary students' cognitive levels
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
